description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: No objections.

The submitted new location plan is in 1:500, which is a block plan,  we require the location plan in 1:1250The red outline in the old location plan does not include the main house and the rear garden area of the proposed outbuilding. Please revise the red outline in the location plan to include all the land required for the proposed site.Note: A Site Location Plan must be at a scale of either 1:1250 which identifies the site and the surrounding area and shows at least two roads and the north point. The site should be outlined in red, the red outline should include land necessary to carry out the proposed development (e.g. land required for access to the site from a public highway, visibility splays, car parking and open areas around buildings).
